Method.Source: static boolean exist( RouteOprId _oprId, ItemCode _itemCode, ItemRelationInvent _itemRelation, EcoResItemConfigurationName _configId, RouteAll _routeCode, RouteRelation _routeRelation, InventSiteId _siteId ) { return (select routeOpr where routeOpr.OprId == _oprId && routeOpr.ItemCode == _itemCode && routeOpr.ItemRelation == _itemRelation && routeOpr.ConfigId == _configId && routeOpr.RouteCode == _routeCode && routeOpr.RouteRelation == _routeRelation && routeOpr.SiteId == _siteId ).RecId != 0; }
